alert.note: Alert for Cass; Miami; Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:03PM EDT until July 20 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wabash County in north central Indiana... Northern Cass County in north central Indiana... Central Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 103 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Logansport, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Logansport, Peru, Wabash, Royal Center, Mexico, Wells, Erie, Denver, Roann, Lagro, Richvalley, Leases Corner, Deedsville, Hoover, Peoria, Lucerne, Anoka, Chili, Ijamsville, and Stockdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
